name: BGP: Unicorn Dash
description:
Chapter 8 of Beginning Game Programming sets us up with the skills we learned in previous chapters to create a Light Cycles Clone (from the movie Tron).

I am aware that this game runs pretty darn slow in the browser. Not sure why that is right now. I may revisit this in the future to fix it.

This example has two players going head to head to try to crash the other player into the lines you draw. This game is two player only.  Use the DPad or Left Analog stick to move your unicorn. That is it.

Please note, this game has only been found to work with controllers in the Chrome Browser. Firefox currently does not work. You can use the keyboard in Firefox. For keyboard controls, player 1 uses WASD and player 2 uses the arrow keys.
